
<!-- the official list of naked modeling functions and their names -->

Name | Traditional notation       |  R notation
------------|---------------------|--------------
exponential | $e^x$               | `exp(x)`
logarithm   | $\ln(x)$            | `log(x)`
sinusoid    | $\sin(x)$           | `sin(x)`
square      | $x^2$               | `x^2`
proportional| $x$                 | `x`
constant    | $1$                 | `1`
reciprocal  | $1/x$ or $x^{-1}$   | `1/x`
gaussian ("hump")        | $\dnorm(x)$         | `dnorm(x)`
sigmoid     | $\pnorm(x)$         | `pnorm(x)`
